title: What is your favorite band from your teenage years and nowadays that has success also? - Quora

response.answer_text: For me, that would have to be Metallica. In the spring/summer of 1988, I started to explore metal good and proper. At first, I knew about Poison, Ratt, Alice Cooper, Def Leppard, and their like. While I enjoyed this, I had the feeling that there was even more to it. And thus, a couple friends introduced me to a few even heavier bands, including Anthrax, Slayer, Judas Priest, Iron Maiden, Megadeth and Metallica. There were many good bands of that era, with each achieving a degree of success in their own rights. Having said that, I think it can be agreed that Metallica is easily the most famous example of them all.
Iron Maiden. Their 2015 Book of Souls release is arguably their best release in more than a decade … And 13 by Black Sabbath is outstanding also . .. Sabbath is 50 now and Maiden 45 ….
